scripts.git-init: git init && git remote add origin https://github.com/VacantThinker/learn_javascript.git
scripts.push-master-branch: git add . && git commit -m 'new' && git push origin master --force
scripts.first-push: npm run git-init && npm run push-master-branch
scripts.second-push: git add . && git commit -m 'new' && git push origin main --force
